column6:
Why would the world's most dangerous escaped super-criminals risk their freedom to destroy New York's version of Mother Teresa? That's the riddle Spider-Man must solve as the U-Foes and Crossfire's crew of mind-control villains converge on a housing project full of innocent souls.,2005,6
32 PGS./T+ Suggested for Teens and Up ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Tony Bedard | penciller (cover):Mike Deodato | inker:Raul Fernandez | penciller:Manuel Garcia | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
